description:
Course Description

Are you a person looking for a crash course in Malayalam?

You may be a holidaymaker planning a trip to Kerala in the near future, or a researcher in Indian languages, or just someone with a passion for learning new languages.

Enroll for this course, and gain working knowledge of this language in just one week!

What is Malayalam?

  • A south Indian language spoken by more than thirty million people
  • Easy to learn phonetic language
  • A language with own compact alphabet

Course Highlights

  • Minimal prerequisites - knowledge of English sufficient
  • course material kept simple and layman oriented, with ample exercises
  • separate modules on speaking, writing/ reading
  • grammatical concepts explained
  • web resources for further knowledge enhancement
title: Beginner Course in Malayalam
